name: Kotal Kahn
title: The Sun God
subtitle: A powerful Osh-Tekk warrior who harnesses the power of the sun to heal allies and destroy enemies
lore: The emperor of Outworld, Kotal Kahn is a warrior of the Osh-Tekk race who draws his power from the sun itself. His mastery over solar energy allows him to both heal his allies and smite his enemies, while his ability to transform into a jaguar makes him a fearsome presence on the battlefield. Despite his intimidating appearance, Kotal Kahn fights with honor and seeks to protect those under his rule.

passive.name: Force of The Sun
passive.description: Kotal Kahn gains stacks on his passive when he takes or deals damage, up to a maximum of [100] stacks. Stacks gained from received damage: [5/stack], stacks gained from dealing damage: [10/autoattack].

Q.name: Sunlight
Q.description: Kotal Kahn summons sunlight to the designated location. Allies within it receive a total of [Stack x [3/6/10/13/15/20]] health. Enemies within the sunlight receive [75%] of this value as damage. The Sunlight lasts for [3s].

W.name: Unbreakable Skin
W.description: Kotal Kahn blocks [80%] of incoming damage for [3s]. Heals for [75/165/330/500/680/1500] after the duration ends.

E.name: Jaguar Form
E.description: Kotal transforms into a jaguar. If he directly autoattacks an enemy, he pounces in jaguar form, dealing [200% AD] damage and slowing the target's movement speed by [70%] for [2s]. Basic abilities can be cast in this form. Kotal's movement speed increases by [50%].

R.name: Sun Blade Fury
R.description: Kotal throws his blade at a designated enemy, which then bounces to nearby enemies. Each hit stuns the target for [1.2s] and deals [230/330/400/485] damage.

1.name: Sun's Blessing
1.description: Quest: Heal for 20.000 HP -> Reward: Stacks are gained at double speed.

1.name: Jaguar's Might
1.description: Quest: Deal damage 15 times in jaguar form -> Reward: You move [40% faster in Jaguar form]

1.name: Solar Power
1.description: Quest: Reach 100 stacks 30 times -> Maximum stacks increased to 150.

5.name: Predator's Strength
5.description: Kotal Kahn deals [14%] more damage in jaguar form.

5.name: Sun's Protection
5.description: Kotal Kahn takes 18% less magic damage for 2s if Sunlight healed him

10.name: Solar Empowerment
10.description: The R ability gains [50] stacks for Kotal.

10.name: Blade Master
10.description: The cooldown of R ability is reduced by [10s] for each enemy hit.

15.name: Battle Hardened
15.description: Kotal Kahn gains [10%] damage reduction when out of combat and for [3s] when entering combat.

15.name: Blood Sacrifice
15.description: Item: Activating the item causes Kotal to lose [65%] of his HP to reach maximum stacks. [70s cd]

15.name: Last Light
15.description: Kotal Kahn's death creates a Sunlight with maximum stacks at his death location.

20.name: Divine Power
20.description: Item: Kotal Kahn's Q and W abilities instantly recharge. [175s cd]

20.name: Sun's Blessing
20.description: Allies affected by Sunlight deal [8%] more damage for [2s].

20.name: Solar Wrath
20.description: Sunlight deals damage equal to its healing amount.

20.name: Solar Mastery
20.description: Kotal Kahn gains a bonus [50] maximum stacks.
